text: int sum ( int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int i , int j , int n , int b [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ) { if ( i > n ) { return a [ i ] [ j ] ; } if ( b [ i ] [ j ] != 0 ) { return b [ i ] [ j ] ; } int s1 = a [ i ] [ j ] + sum ( a , i + 1 , j , n , b ) ; int s2 = a [ i ] [ j ] + sum ( a , i + 1 , j + 1 , n , b ) ; if ( s1 > s2 ) { b [ i ] [ j ] = s1 ; return s1 ; } else { b [ i ] [ j ] = s2 ; return s2 ; } } int main ( void ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , n , i , j , k , T , b [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < T ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d\n" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d " , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { b [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } int ans = sum ( a , 0 , 0 , n , b ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , ans ) ; } return 0 ; }
